name: phicl

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cfv(cphi, c0), cn), wcel(cfv(cphi, c0), co(nat1, cfz, c0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cfv(cphi, c0), cn))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cfv(cphi, c0), co(nat1, cfz, c0)))
-| wi(wcel(cfv(cphi, c0), co(nat1, cfz, c0)), wcel(cfv(cphi, c0), cn))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cfv(cphi, c0), cn))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cfv(cphi, c0), co(nat1, cfz, c0)))
-| wi(wcel(cfv(cphi, c0), co(nat1, cfz, c0)), wcel(cfv(cphi, c0), cn))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cfv(cphi, c0), co(nat1, cfz, c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cfv(cphi, c0), cn))
-| wi(wcel(cfv(cphi, c0), co(nat1, cfz, c0)), wcel(cfv(cphi, c0), cn))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(cfv(cphi, c0), co(nat1, cfz, c0)), wcel(cfv(cphi, c0), cn))

comment: Closure for the value of the Euler ` phi ` function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Feb-2014.)
